mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_nick as memberNick, zip, road_addr as roadAddr, det_addr as detAddr, card, enroll_date as enrollDate, member_level as memberLevel, gender, age, member_profile as memberProfile, email, expire_date as expireDate, phone, email_verification as emailVerification from member where member_level = 3;
